ThingDef.label: bardiche
ThingDef.description: A long pole-arm with a large, hooked blade at the end. Slow, but inflicts a lot of damage.

ThingDef.label: bat
ThingDef.description: The bat is a weapon once used long ago in the ancient game of baseball. The sport has long since faded into obscurity, but the bat has stuck around, though it's now used for bashing in skulls instead of hitting home runs.

ThingDef.label: chained bat
ThingDef.description: The bat is a weapon once used long ago in the ancient game of baseball. The sport has long since faded into obscurity, but the bat has stuck around, though it's now used for bashing in skulls instead of hitting home runs. This one has been wrapped in chains to provide some extra punch to the impact.

ThingDef.label: spiked bat
ThingDef.description: The bat is a weapon once used long ago in the ancient game of baseball. The sport has long since faded into obscurity, but the bat has stuck around, though it's now used for bashing in skulls instead of hitting home runs. This one has nails driven through the end. If the spikes don't kill you, the tetanus will.

ThingDef.label: baton
ThingDef.description: A light blunt weapon used by police and military across the galaxy as a defensive weapon.

ThingDef.label: billhook
ThingDef.description: A short bladed machete with a hooked end. Often used by farmers, as the hooked blade allows it slice through foliage and crops with ease.\n\n[BONUS]: +15% Plant Work Speed.

ThingDef.label: cleaver
ThingDef.description: A short knife with a heavy broad blade. Perfect for butchering carcasses.\n\n[BONUS]: +10% Butchery Speed and +5 Butchery Effiency.

ThingDef.label: crowbar
ThingDef.description: A tool with a chiseled end and a curved head. Often used to open wooden crates or to remove large nails, but can be used to lethal effect with wielded as a weapon.

ThingDef.label: fireaxe
ThingDef.description: A large axe with a razor sharp, broad blade on one side and a pick on the other. Much heavier than the Hatcher, but much more damaging.

ThingDef.label: glaive
ThingDef.description: A pole-arm with a large blade on the end. Faster than the other pole-arms, but not as damaging.

ThingDef.label: halberd
ThingDef.description: A long pole-arm with an axe head for hacking and a long spike for stabbing. Slower than the other pole-arms, but more effective.

ThingDef.label: hatchet
ThingDef.description: A small, one handed axe. Fitted with a sharp head and a flat side for blunt work.

ThingDef.label: hooksword
ThingDef.description: A short sword that ends in a hook. Hookswords are incredibly light, allowing the user to make quick strikes.

ThingDef.label: karambit
ThingDef.description: A small, but incredibly sharp curved blade. Used to quickly and lethally strike at vital spots, cutting through flesh and bone alike.

ThingDef.label: kukri
ThingDef.description: A recurved knife used as both a tool and a weapon. Fast, and very sharp.

ThingDef.label: machete
ThingDef.description: A sharp, broad bladed short sword. Often used as a tool for clearing brush in jungles and forest, but will cut through flesh just as easy.

ThingDef.label: mallet
ThingDef.description: A small hammer with a large blunt head. Inneffective as a weapon, but great for shaping hot metals at a smithy.\n\n[BONUS]: +8% Smithing Speed.

ThingDef.label: maul
ThingDef.description: A devastating heavy weapon with a sledge on one side and an axe head on the other. Can easily pulverize flesh and bone into dust.

ThingDef.label: pickaxe
ThingDef.description: An ancient tool, composed of a dense shaft with a double sided chisel head. Used around the galaxy in mining operations, but can also be used as a somewhat effective melee weapon.\n\n[BONUS]: +15% Mining Speed.

ThingDef.label: pitchfork
ThingDef.description: A farming tool used for moving hay. While it's 4 pronged head is designed for stabbing throug piles of hay, it can just as easily stab through flesh.

ThingDef.label: pollaxe
ThingDef.description: A long pole-arm with a broad axe head on one side and a spiked hammer on the other. The most balanced of the pole-arms, combining damage and speed.

ThingDef.label: sickle
ThingDef.description: A tool with a sharp curved blade, often used by farmers. The shape of the blade allows it harvest crops more efficiently than by hand.\n\n[BONUS]: +15% Plant Harvest Yield.

ThingDef.label: sledgehammer
ThingDef.description: A heavy, double sided sledge, used for smashing rocks, but will smash skulls just as easy.

ThingDef.label: trench knife
ThingDef.description: An ancient knife design dated back to the wars of the old worlds. A razor sharp knife, with brass knuckles fused to the handle.

ThingDef.label: trench club
ThingDef.description: Trench Clubs are old world era weapons used in close quarters combat. A dense handle with a thick, spiked head makes for the lethal damage.

ThingDef.label: zweihander
ThingDef.description: A hulking two handed sword. While heavy and slow, the Zweihander can easily cleave through a would-be attacker.
